data.text: the 'ow' as in 'now' diphthong. Tongue up to make the N. The lips form the tight circle

data.text: for the W, when, tongue tip up for the N. I came, lips together for the M sound. Back,

data.text: the tongue up in the back to make the K sound. To town, with the 'ow' as in 'now' diphthong,

data.text: second half of the diphthong. Teeth make the Z position. Dead, tongue tip up for the D.

data.text: And brown, again, the 'ow' as in 'now' diphthong. The tongue there coming forward from being

data.text: back for the R. When with the 'eh' as in 'bed', tongue up for the N. When I came, lips together

data.text: for the M. Back, you can see the tongue moving up in the back for the K sound. To with the

data.text: schwa, town. Again the 'ow' as in 'now' diphthong, see the tongue moving back and the lips rounding.

translation.text: schwa, thị trấn. Một lần nữa, 'ow' như trong 'bây giờ' diphthong, thấy lưỡi di chuyển trở lại và đôi môi tròn.

data.text: Tongue tip up for the N. That's it, and thanks so much for using Rachel's English.

translation.text: Đầu lưỡi cho N. Đó là nó, và cảm ơn rất nhiều vì đã sử dụng tiếng Anh của Rachel.

title: English: How to Pronounce OW [aʊ] diphthong: American Accent
